column1: Se había partido prácticamente en dos pedazos, y la punta oscilaba, sujeta sólo por unas pocas astillas.
column2: It had practically broken in two pieces, and the tip was swinging, held in place only by a few splinters.

column1: Se había partido prácticamente en dos pedazos, y la punta oscilaba, sujeta sólo por unas pocas astillas.
column2: It had practically broken in two pieces, and the tip was swinging, held in place only by a few splinters.
column5: la astilla also chip or a bribe/sweetener

column1: Tengo cerillas, así que podemos hacer un fuego si encontramos astillas.
column2: I have matches, so we can make a fire if we can find kindling.

column1: Cuando hubieron comido todos los emparedados que podían (en el plato iban apareciendo más, conforme los engullían), ...
column2: When they had eaten as many sandwiches as they could (more were appearing on the plate as they gobbled them down), ...
